description:
This table contains flowsheet row (FLO) data for an encounter. This table is a key table in tying LDA assessment row lines in flowsheet data records to the LDAs, and the necessary joins are:


 


IP_FLOWSHEET_ROWS.IP_LDA_ID with IP_LDA_NOADDSINGLE.IP_LDA_ID


IP_FLOWSHEET_ROWS.INPATIENT_DATA_ID with IP_FLWSHT_REC.INPATIENT_DATA_ID


IP_FLOWSHEET_ROWS.LINE with IP_FLWSHT_MEAS.OCCURANCE


IP_FLWSHT_REC.FSD_ID with IP_FLWSHT_MEAS.FSD_ID.

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the inpatient data store record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the item.

columns.name: FLO_MEAS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the flowsheet group/row.

columns.name: FLO_MEAS_ID_DISP_NAME
columns.description: The display name given to the flowsheet group/row.

columns.name: FLOWSHT_ROW_NAME
columns.description: The flowsheet row name. Especially comes into play when a custom name is given to a duplicable row/group, either by a user typing it upon manually adding a row/group or from the order that fired the task template which added the duplicable row/group.

columns.name: IP_LDA_ID
columns.description: Stores the Lines/Drains/Airways (LDA) ID for the flowsheet group.

columns.name: ROW_VARIANCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The flowsheet row variance.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Add


Remove
